p: The chemical composition data showed that lupine seed cultivar Boregine is a valuable source of protein (25% in whole seed). The protein content of whole lupine seeds was lower than what has been reported in other studies for L. angustifolius. This may be due to differences in cultivars; several authors have shown protein contents ranging from 26.5% to 35.8% [ 4, 6, 15], all with different cultivars.
